TopicTitle: [PART, 1.0.2] Anatid Robotics / MuMech - MechJeb - Autopilot - Historical thread

Articles.Content:
Well it kept happening every time I started the game as soon as I started the game after installing the ver -35 dev build. It happened in the 2.0.5 ver as well but was random, I couldn't do anything or control any selected ships because as soon as the models and physics loaded the Orbiting and or Landed on Body would vanish and the game stopped responding to inputs except opening menus and exiting the game and even that froze sometimes.

5 attempts to load the game, 3 complete reboots same results every time. And like I said as soon as I replaced the stable 2.0.7 it worked fine.
What's the story with the Mechjeb 2 window layout not saving / saving sporadically? It's getting a little old having to set up all my windows again...

Whenever I equip a ship with a mechjeb module, my sound starts to cut out for a fraction of a second, approximately every 5 seconds or so. If I remove the module the problem seems to go away. Is this a known issue, and if so is there a fix for it?

Can you explain what "gravity acceleration / deceleration options" would be? I'm not sure what you're referring to.

Use plants/moons to accelerate / decelerate

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Tutorial:_Gravity_Assist

Whenever I equip a ship with a mechjeb module, my sound starts to cut out for a fraction of a second, approximately every 5 seconds or so. If I remove the module the problem seems to go away. Is this a known issue, and if so is there a fix for it?

It's a known issue called stuttering. As of yet, there's no none way to get rid of it, but as of yet, KSP is not fully optimized. We're still in alpha, so we'll just have to sit back and wait.

what's up with NYAN cat?? Its cool and all i guess but it kinda sometimes gets to me when im doing something "important" , i see NYAN cat and start singing the NYAN song!!!!!! This is NOT GOOD when im docking or trying to get something HUGE off teh ground!!! the dude abides!!

what's up with NYAN cat?? Its cool and all i guess but it kinda sometimes gets to me when im doing something "important" , i see NYAN cat and start singing the NYAN song!!!!!! This is NOT GOOD when im docking or trying to get something HUGE off teh ground!!! the dude abides!!

You have Romfarer stuff installed. Apparently there was an issue with the Ramfarer gui system, so Duck and Ramon added a little "reminder" to Romfarer to fix it. I'm not sure what the error is, but this solution is pretty funny.
Nyan cat? huh? can someone post a screen shot of this, because I just haven't seen it yet.

Nyan cat? huh? can someone post a screen shot of this, because I just haven't seen it yet.

it shows on multiple "menu's" .dock cam, and few others
And just looking at it now, i am nana anannn nnnanananna "ing" in my head lol
I've been looking at those rainbow windows for days now.... and I NEVER NOTICED the cat head. Yikes, I might need my eyesight checked....
On Mechjeb, Version 2 and 1.9.8 the landing guidance for a space plane doesn't work, i'm on a mac, and when I engage it, it just points directly down and doesn't do anything.

On Mechjeb, Version 2 and 1.9.8 the landing guidance for a space plane doesn't work, i'm on a mac, and when I engage it, it just points directly down and doesn't do anything.
I'm on a Mac too and it works fine. A picture of your Plane could help.

On Mechjeb, Version 2 and 1.9.8 the landing guidance for a space plane doesn't work, i'm on a mac, and when I engage it, it just points directly down and doesn't do anything.

Are you out of atmosphere? Because the space-plane landing guidance only works if your wings have lift in atmos.... I would recommend using rocket-style landing guidance prior to atmospheric landing, and then turn on the space-plane guidance as you enter the atmosphere.

I've been looking at those rainbow windows for days now.... and I NEVER NOTICED the cat head. Yikes, I might need my eyesight checked....

Yeah.. Please dear gods get that fixed. I HATE nyan cat... Almost as much as engi hates spy nyan hoovy....

MechJeb 2.0 doesn't work. Any things i have to pay attention while installing it?

I put the .dll in de Plugin Folder and the Parts in the Parts Folder.

Use plants/moons to accelerate / decelerate

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Tutorial:_Gravity_Assist

I've been thinking about some sort of tool to help you plan gravity assists off planets for interplanetary trajectories. It might happen at some point.

I've been thinking about some sort of tool to help you plan gravity assists off planets for interplanetary trajectories. It might happen at some point.

Wonderful possible news!

Whenever I equip a ship with a mechjeb module, my sound starts to cut out for a fraction of a second, approximately every 5 seconds or so. If I remove the module the problem seems to go away.
It's a known issue called stuttering. As of yet, there's no none way to get rid of it, but as of yet, KSP is not fully optimized. We're still in alpha, so we'll just have to sit back and wait.

Since stuttering occurs with MJ installed (and used on a vessel) but not without, it seems to be not exclusively a KSP issue.

these settings in the settings.cfg help some but don't eliminate the sound stutter completely. the short interval is set to 5 in the default settings.cfg.

AUTOSAVE_INTERVAL = 900

AUTOSAVE_SHORT_INTERVAL = 300
For those of you that still have the cat and rainbows, update your Lazor plugins. It's been fixed for 10 days!

For those of you that still have the cat and rainbows, update your Lazor plugins. It's been fixed for 10 days!

Why didn't he post it here? D: ba dum ch!
because its his lazor mod,and this is the mj thread.... just saying.

I've been thinking about some sort of tool to help you plan gravity assists off planets for interplanetary trajectories. It might happen at some point.

Hey, TheDuck, let me know if I can help here. I've already got the math worked out for flyby targeting, and it's not trivial. I would love to see this in MJ though, so PM me if you're seriously considering this and would like math/astrodynamics support again.

Seems the Settings loss is still around. I modified the stock and KSPX command pods to include MechJeb2, only one problem. It wont maintain settings for some reason.

Edit: NM, I think this has to do with modding the settings so you don't lag time.
